title: Drifters
brief_description: The only film ever directed personally by John Grierson, this documentary was made for the Empire Marketing Board about the men on the British herring fleets, which employed montage and documentary techniques to demonstrate the human side of the fishing industry.

constellations_primary.name: Reconstructing reality
constellations_primary.description: While documentary pertains to be about the truth, many filmmakers and artists have used ingenious reconstructions to represent an abstracted honesty.
